enrollment_guide.title: Admissions Process
enrollment_guide.description: Learn about the steps required to apply for admission to Example University.
steps: Submit required documents (transcripts, letters of recommendation, etc.).

enrollment_guide.title: Financial Aid
enrollment_guide.description: Explore the various financial aid options available to students.

options.name: Grants
options.description: Need-based financial aid that does not require repayment.

options.name: Loans
options.description: Borrowed money that must be repaid with interest.

enrollment_guide.title: Programs Offered
enrollment_guide.description: Browse through the various academic programs available at Example University.

programs.name: Computer Science
programs.description: Explore the world of computing and technology.

programs.name: Business Administration
programs.description: Learn about management, finance, marketing, and more.
